message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $60, you take $40. A fair deal considering the inflation.
My turn. Let's be practical -  I take $55, leaving you with $45.  Inflation is eating into my share each round.
Bob, time is money, and yours is literally shrinking. I'll take $65, you get $35.  Don't let inflation eat away at your share any further.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My money is rapidly losing value.  Let's split it 50/50 and end this.
